about_the_game:
Do you need some fancy and cool looking potions in your game? This pack brings a collection of 4K crafted potions illustrations, icons and tileset pieces!

Features:

- Everything crafted in 4K (2160x2160)!
- 10 designs!
- 14 Colors!
- 3 versions!
- 420 illustrations!
- "Tileset" version included! (Default, Proportional and Proportional+Shadow)
- "Iconset" version included!
- Separated pics included in multiple resolutions (24x24, 32x32, 48x48, 300x300, 1024x1024, 2160x2160)
- Enjoy!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
